title: Lauryn Hill-Consumerism (2013) 128
description:
Lauryn Hill-Consumerism (2013) 128

Consumerism is part of some material I was trying to finish before I had to come in. We did our best to eek out a mix via verbal and emailed direction, thanks to the crew of surrogate ears on the other side. Letters From Exile is material written from a certain space, in a certain place. I felt the need to discuss the underlying socio-political, cultural paradigm as I saw it. But inspiration of this sort is a kind of news in and of itself, and often times contains an urgency that precedes what happens. I couldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t imagine it not being relevant.
